website_summaries.verdict: An extremely versatile unit. We love the all-around usefulness of this oven.
pros: Great for those looking for a unit that does a lot more than pizza
Decent pizza oven, but it also handles a lot of smaller dishes and snacks

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Oven
customer_reviews.text: We use this in a small restaurant, and it is working just fine. We cook pizzas and large pretzels. Everything turns out very well. The oven fits well in a shelf. It's easy to clean. The temperature is accurate and works well. We would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: i am very happy with this pizza oven, have used it for frozen pizzas and home made pizza pies. preheats quickly and large enough to fit decent size pizza in there. have used it to heat up other items as well, larger area to use instead of the toaster oven. extremely happy with this purchase and this has earned a permanent spot on my countertop!. one thing to note when you are done cooking the fan will run for some time (maybe 5 minutes) while it cools down and is a little bit noisy but that does not bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We make frozen pizza at home more than I would like to admit. We currently live in an apartment with a super crappy oven, so we decided to purchase this pizza oven with the intention of putting it in our future home bar. It works like a dream and has made making frozen pizza an even easier breeze. There is NOTHING like a pizza made in a pizza oven; it's simply the best. I am SO glad we made this purchase. It definitely gets its use and I would highly recommend to the pizza-obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hook

customer_reviews.title: Magical Pizza Oven...buy it
customer_reviews.text: Is it magic, supernatural, maybe aliens? The pizza oven can turn the cheapest frozen pizza into a party in your mouth. Tony's frozen pizza on sale, buy 1 get 9 free.....Score! Throw some canned mushrooms on, a few hot peppers and you are good to go. Of course, a having a few beers first helps. We brought ours to hunting camp along with a generator just to run the pizza oven.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: More than just a pizza oven!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this pizza oven for the office. Yes, it does make excellent pizza (from scratch or frozen) but also does so much more. We make cinnamon rolls, croissants, pies, pizza, cookies, etc. The low temp setting is around 350 and high is 450. Low temp seems to do well for about anything. It is a good idea to spin what you're cooking about halfway since the back gets a little hotter than the front of the oven. Definitely one of the best employee incentive items we've ever bought, everyone absolutely loves it! Product is well made, easy to keep clean and can be put away easily for storage.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: More Expensive Does not mean better
customer_reviews.text: We had a cheap Bakers Secret pizza oven for several years. it worked great for the quick frozen pizza, which is what we used it for. When it started cooking one half of the pizza more than the other, I researched pizza ovens online and based on the recommendations, bought this one. After several months it has become clear that this is not a good oven for frozen pizzas. It does not get the pizza crust crisp without burning the pizza - regardless of whether you use the high or low heat setting. it is not better, just more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for two weeks, but my wife and I LOVE it for Friday 'pizza nights' - too easy and makes our thin crust pizzas crunchy and perfect! We have not tried anything thicker, but I imagine the thicker ones will cook just fine, only take a bit longer...
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing all the time. I put it in my shop on top of my beer fridge and I don't even have to leave the shop to eat. I've only made pizzas but can't wait to see how it works on other things. It cost more then other pizza ovens but in my mind its totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Papawheelie81

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: This product? Fantastic!! If you love Pizza and want it to cook evenly and in a good time range? This one is the bees knees! Easy to use and easy to clean. The tray does need to be lined up when put back into the unit, but cmon there are little metal guides for that. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: It cooks very quickly and gets the pizza tasting it’s best.
customer_reviews.text: This has reached beyond my expectations! Not only does it cook the pizza perfectly, but I don’t have to wait around 20 minutes for it to be fully cooked! Before getting this oven, I would have to wait 20 minutes for the pizza to be almost cooked, but with this oven, I only have to wait 12; excellent oven! Would recommend to every pizza lover.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Makes a perfect golden brown pizza and more!
customer_reviews.text: This oven is great! I bought it for the break room at work and we've done pizza, pizza rolls, cookies from dough (on low setting, watching every step of the way) bagels, nachos, waffles and more. After learning the "hot spots" after the first few uses you will know when to shift the food throughout its cooking cycle. Very easy controls, power, high, low, and minutes up or down. Heats up quick.
customer_reviews.author: J. Young

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs a pizza oven!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs a pizza oven! This is our second Wisco pizza oven (first one wore out after about 12 years and hundreds of pizzas). We have this in our basement bar and it is great to make frozen pizzas. So easy for my son and his friends to make a quick snack.
customer_reviews.author: KLM

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenager for Christmas and he loves it. We make pizzas from scratch and they cook in 8-9 minutes, depending on the toppings. Is it pizzeria perfect? No, but the results are much better than the ones we had been baking in the regular oven. And it's convenient for cooking other things as well. The price was well worth the look on his face when he got it.
customer_reviews.author: Orion

customer_reviews.title: Digital pizza oven is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: The last pizza oven that we owned was a different brand and it had knobs for the timer and the cooking elements, both of those knobs broke after time and we had to use a pliers to cook a pizza, after sometime the timer broke and the oven became worthless so I am a firm believer in this new oven with a digital timer and no knobs. So far we have been very very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: TIM KRAHN

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever! I use it ALL the time rather than heating up my big oven, and honestly it makes better Pizza/Pizza pockets/Little tacos/Garlic bread than my big oven does!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Gray

customer_reviews.title: Crisp Crust
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this brand of pizza oven for my bar because I also own a 16 inch oven made by them. It gets the crust crisp without burning the top. Will cook a works pizza in approximately 15 to 20 minutes and it comes out perfect. It offers two different temperature settings.
customer_reviews.author: Patti S.

customer_reviews.title: The best. What can i say
customer_reviews.text: The best. What can i say .used it love it. Thanks wisco Execellent product. will recomment to small setups and households. Pizza is ready in about 12-15 minutes depending on how you want it done.
customer_reviews.author: carl

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Pizza Oven
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice Pizza Oven. It is more expensive than a lot of models for a reason. It cooks evenly and quickly. Most frozen Pizzas can be made in 15 minutes - without it even needing to heat up first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice unit and cooks great but the fan quit working within a month of receiving it. I'm thinking it's going back. It might not be an issue with infrequent use,1 or 2 times a week at most,but it ought to work like it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny O

customer_reviews.title: Can't never seem to get the pizza done right. ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't never seem to get the pizza done right . Either too done or not done enough. Can't get it to adjust properly. For all it has been used, should have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present for my husband.
customer_reviews.text: we use this thing all the time for more than just pizza.. and we love it.. I got a laptop for Christmas my husband got this. he got the better deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Tramp

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: This might be a great item but the one we received when we got it all unpacked and plugged in the oven would not come on. We checked to see if we had tripped a breaker but the outlet was fine. The oven was just not getting power. Must have been wired wrong. We packed it up and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E.

customer_reviews.title: Best affordable pizza ovens
customer_reviews.text: Had one before and these digital ones are the way to go. The twist timer ones are garbage. These also have high and low setting and cook evenly and quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Toady

customer_reviews.title: Frozen pizza done perfectly in about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product to bake a frozen pizza. Bought it to use instead of our stove’s oven on hot days as the oven really heats up the house. There is no pre-heating, just put the pizza in and in about 10 minutes its perfectly done. Gluten free pizza is what we mainly bake in this oven.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C.

customer_reviews.title: Better than using the oven
customer_reviews.text: Had this product previously as a non-digital style and loved it. Digital does not seem to be as efficient, but still pleased. Enjoy not heating up a standard oven in the Arizona summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: Mtn View Lutheran Church

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, love it!!! You can make a cheap pizza taste like restaurant style!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Liked the older model better but when we got used to it works well
customer_reviews.author: Robin Redel

customer_reviews.title: Pizza made right.
customer_reviews.text: This is a super Pizza oven. I'm glad i went for a better quality oven.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Christy

customer_reviews.title: Pizza oven is great all around
customer_reviews.text: Pizza oven is great all around, use it weekly sometime twice, definitely love the way the pizza taste coming out
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: oven
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oven for my boys to use and they love it. It gets used every day. I find the tray a little difficult to slide in straight, but my teenagers must have it mastered.
customer_reviews.author: tdohrman

customer_reviews.title: Great Oven
customer_reviews.text: Love this oven, i use it for all kinds of things not just pizza.......
customer_reviews.author: PangyCola

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you order
customer_reviews.text: For the price, really good machine - professional use. It does exactly what it is suppose to do. You have to know how to use it though, as the middle is not as hot as the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L

customer_reviews.title: not made in wisconson like someone said
customer_reviews.text: not made in wisconson like someone said, made in china and sold out of wis. very cheap made but it did work good. nothing like my old one
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: cooks a 13" frozen pizza in 13 min. and the piuzza tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES D. BURNS

customer_reviews.title: Yes to the Pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: Got this product for RV. Love it. Quick note though. Really thick pizzas cook longer on lower temp otherwise middle is a tad soft
customer_reviews.author: Gordoneia

customer_reviews.title: This one works.
customer_reviews.text: It did burn off some factory coating material the first time I used it. The fan is nice to vent the unit. Have only used high temperature setting so far. If you're looking for a pizza oven with the correct price point, this one works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: nikdor300

customer_reviews.title: Good fast pizza
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about this and they were right on. I Use this alot and I'm really getting the hang of it. I Would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Forest N. Gilland

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wish we would have bought one of these years ago! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This unit works fine. You will need less time than usual due to the efficiency of this oven.
customer_reviews.author: DJ SQUARED

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for my teen since it shuts down after the ...
customer_reviews.text: this little oven allows me to heat, re-heat, or bake without having to use the large oven or microwave. It is perfect for my teen since it shuts down after the selected time. The fan forced air makes for even cooking at a much faster pace than my conventional oven. High/Low speed allows for baking or quick heat flash on my sandwiches. Built to last. Use mine for wings, pretzels, pizza rolls, bread sticks, tamales, egg rolls, frozen burritos, and taquitos.
customer_reviews.author: foresure1986

customer_reviews.title: perfect. Great addition for the garage
customer_reviews.text: Use only Tombstone pizzas. In froze for 13 minutes, perfect. Great addition for the garage. Cooked ten plus pizzas, no issues as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey D

customer_reviews.title: I love my pizza oven!!
customer_reviews.text: This is always on my counter-I love this oven and it can be used for more than pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Mszinger

customer_reviews.title: We've cooked two pizzas and the top was done perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: We've cooked two pizzas and the top was done perfectly but the bottom was not. I noticed the bottom coil does not get red, is it supposed to?
customer_reviews.author: Pam Cappetto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pizza and snack oven. Great for the office break room.
customer_reviews.author: eddy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Cooks evenly. We use it for everything from pizza to popcorn chicken and french fries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better and quicker than heating up your oven for pizza
customer_reviews.text: Didn't receive 5 stars only because sliding the pizza tray in sometimes gets a little snug and difficult to slide on the rails
customer_reviews.author: Jon A.

customer_reviews.title: use to have a tombstone oven years ago. Decided ...
customer_reviews.text: use to have a tombstone oven years ago. Decided to get this one as it was highly rated--does not do well on thicker crust pizzas.
customer_reviews.author: Judy R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results
customer_reviews.text: Excellent temp control. I use it for flatbread pizzas in my restaurant. Perfect every time. The handle is a bit weird as it doesn't stay tight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to use, 2 temp settings
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the digital keypad is a nice upgrade from my old dial version. Set it and forget it! Wisco makes a quality product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great. Does what we want it to do
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Does what we want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Lee Wood

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: No true pizza setting. 350° and 450°. Digorno pizza recommends 400°.
customer_reviews.author: Ritter and Co.

customer_reviews.title: Love the oven
customer_reviews.text: Love the oven. The wire rack could use the wires a little closer together. The two heating elements cook the pizza even. The two different cooking temperatures is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Grassman

customer_reviews.title: This pizza oven is great. It makes food taste better
customer_reviews.text: This pizza oven is great. It makes food taste better, and u don't have to wait for the oven 2 heat up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. We bought this oven for our home bar. Cooked pizza to perfection. Hoping for many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Oven
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding units, replacing some older more manual ovens. Does a much better job and digital countdown makes it a lot easier to watch how much long a pizza has to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Yates

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Oven works great Cooks of pizza even very happy with the product seems to be well built
customer_reviews.author: Randal Olson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good pizza oven. Takes some time to get used to the times and differnt temps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works really well. This oven can cook a ...
customer_reviews.text: It works really well. This oven can cook a pizza in 10 to 14 minutes compared to our old one that took 25 to 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and looks good to.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice 11 minutes and frozen pizza comes out perfect. It would be nice to have more heat adjustments through.
customer_reviews.author: Edward P.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Only draw back I would say is you only have two temperature settings, FYI!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Topping

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: oven came with dent in door. seems to burn crust in that area unless turned midway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a great pizza oven. I had one previously that lasted 20 years which I liked very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! does just what I expected. The only drawback for me is the handle design.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Schramm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 2 years cooking a lot of pizzas and still being an incredible oven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome oven
customer_reviews.text: We had to get a new one due to our last one of about 10- years the timer going out on it and this is even better than the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money, and space saving
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because I cook at a local bar. It gets the job done doing pizzas and some other items I have on the menu. I gave it 4 stars because I think it could do a better job of cooking the pizza well done.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Okay Pizza Oven - not worth price
customer_reviews.text: Just okay. I don't like the 2 temps and doesn't seem to cook top to bottom evenly. We had to move to the garage since the smoke alarm always went off.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mattes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Excellent deal on a great product. We use ours all the time. I would recommend this for anyone who loves homemade pizza!
customer_reviews.author: Amos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the dual temp choices and the 30 minute digital timer!
customer_reviews.author: thomas mcmahon

customer_reviews.title: Currently looks like a wasted $90
customer_reviews.text: Fan stopped working within a month. Since it is not eligible for return, I will be contacting the company. Currently looks like a wasted $90.
customer_reviews.author: JASON O.

customer_reviews.title: Worst pizza oven ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst pizza oven ever! It burns the outside edge around the pizza! I have smashed mine and are going back to Biaggia!
customer_reviews.author: Scott W. Noyes

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for making pizza at the National Restaraunt Show (I sell cheese). I probably made as many pizzas in 4 days as most will in a year and this little guy was a champ. Heat was even, top and bottom, and plenty hot to get a nice even melt with just the right browning. Can't vouch for longevity yet, but overall build seems very good.
customer_reviews.author: Peffinger

customer_reviews.title: This thing bakes the best pizza but wait till you try egg rolls and ...
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a pizza oven. This thing bakes the best pizza but wait till you try egg rolls and hot pockets and any other oven cooked foods. The double element in the top and bottom of this oven cooks fast but evenly. I've reheated leftover pizza and other foods and it taste just as good. This device is a winner. For anyone who buys one ...I assure you won't be unhappy with this baby. Try oven roasted potato skins in the unit. The thing has a cook living inside of it watching your food and making it taste like your at a great restaurant. Like Applebee's . Makes the very best chicken wings I ever had too.
customer_reviews.author: Ran-C

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our bar. Frozen pizzas are a breeze with this handy oven! The only disappointing thing is that it is made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: great oven
customer_reviews.text: the oven at our work broke and this became the replacement - i like the low ad high settings the other one did not have
customer_reviews.author: irish in wisconsin

product_meta.title: Wisco 425C-001 Digital Pizza Oven, 12"
product_meta.description: Digitally controlled oven with two heat settings designed to do original crust pizzas as well as the ever popular, rising dough crust pizzas. But it's baking capability doesn't end there! Cookies, pretzels, sandwiches, hot dogs, frozen appetizers and even pies, to name just a few, have been baked off in this oven with perfect results every time!.
feature_bullets: Flip up handle design for easier storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars157 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
